summary:
Digging into complex topics, unravel the essence and translate it into a logic and reproducible story, I simply love it.

When taking my first steps in veterinary pharmaceutical industry a couple of years ago, I could never have imagined that being a technical manager would turn out to be the perfect position for me. But here I am, constantly looking for new scientific updates to educate myself and others. Looking for the right research-based angle to position products, identifying exactly those distinguishing traits needed to stand out from competition. I dare to say that no matter what products a portfolio encompasses, I will always find a way to get the utmost best out of it.


Helping my colleagues and customers, that’s what I stand for.
